response.answer_text: Yes, it worked for me. I applied lemon juice on one end of the q-tips and placed it on the mole for around 8–10 minutes and then let it dry. I did it twice a day one in the morning and one before my bedtime. And after 8–9 days the skin around the mole began to peel off along with the mole and now it's completely gone. Don't forget to apply some Vaseline around the mole as it could harm the skin around and it's quite painful. Hope that works !

I have only recently heard about this. My 22 year old daughter was putting Apple Cider Vinegar onto her moles and they died and dropped off. Mild vinegar WILL kill moles - but you need to be careful that they are not melanomas that need closer medical attention.
